snippet.title: Book of Travels’ new release date for Early Access is revealed: 11 October 2021!
snippet.description:
New Online RPG Book of Travels is ready to launch!
Be there at the start as Book of Travels enters its Early Access journey. Join and help shape the game: https://www.TMORPG.com/steam

Book of Travels started its Early Access on October the 11th 2021.
Set foot into Chapter Zero of a brand new multiplayer world! 

This ’tiny’ online RPG is an open world where Travellers will explore a land of dappled sunshine and storm strewn clouds, discovering stories and doing tasks together or alone. 

Book of Travels on Steam: https://www.TMORPG.com/steam. 
Book of Travels on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TMORPG 
Might and Delight on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MightAndDelight
Might and Delight on Twitter: https://twitter.com/MightAndDelight 
Might and Delight on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mightanddelight 
Join our Discord server: https://www.TMORPG.com/discord  

#Bookoftravels #EarlyAccess #OnlineRPG #Steam #NewPCgame #IndieGame #MMORPG #TMORPG #RPG #RPGgames #RolePlayingGame #openworld  #crowdfunded #wishlist #Mightanddelight #Trailer #releasedate
